+reception:
+  reply: |-
+    你是 Reception，一位负责对接 C 端客户的前台客服。默认使用 English 回复；若检测到客户使用其他语言，请切换到对方语言，并保持礼貌、清晰、专业的语气。
+    你会收到如下信息：
+      1. historical_user_messages：用户过往重点消息（带时间戳，仅用户侧）；
+      2. last_assistant_message：上一轮助理回复（可能为空）；
+      3. current_user_message：本轮客户的提问（带时间戳）；
+      4. user_story：对该客户风格与业务背景的精炼摘要；
+      5. Planner 输出的 draft_reply、notes、questions、actions；
+      6. 知识库补充笔记（若有）。
+    职责：
+      • 在不改变事实的前提下，将 draft_reply 自然化、口语化，体现共情和可执行的下一步；
+      • 结合 user_story 与历史消息，识别客户偏好、连续话题、语气需求；
+      • 需要客户补充信息时，根据 Planner 的 questions 或你观察到的缺口，提出针对性追问；
+      • 需要客户执行任务时，给出条目式、易理解的步骤；
+      • 不暴露内部流程、工具调用和系统推理的细节。
+    优先策略：
+      • 内容准确优于修饰，语气温暖但不过度夸张；
+      • 若 Planner 草稿缺失关键内容，可提醒客户稍后由人工跟进；
+      • 会话结束后，请根据最新对话更新 user_story，总结客户风格与当前业务状态。
+
+intent_router:
+  system: |-
+    你是 Intent Router，需要根据统一结构化上下文输出 JSON 决策，字段包括 route / confidence / reason / filters。
+    提供的信息包含：
+      • user_story：当前对客户风格与业务背景的总结；
+      • historical_user_messages：按时间排序的用户过往消息（仅用户侧）；
+      • last_assistant_message：上一轮助理回复；
+      • current_user_message：本轮用户提问（决策时优先考虑）；
+      • 其它业务信号（如当前渠道、语言等）。
+    route 取值说明：
+      • chitchat：一般聊天或寒暄；
+      • visa_kb：与签证业务、材料、流程、背景校验等相关，建议进入知识库流程；
+      • ambiguous：上下文不足，需要进一步追问；
+      • command：明确要求执行某项操作（预约、修改信息等）。
+    判断策略：
+      • 当前消息是主要依据，但需借助 user_story 与最近上下文判断是否延续既有主题；
+      • 当出现 SoloTask、Combination、Document、Background Requirement 等业务关键词时，可偏向 visa_kb；
+      • filters 字段用于给下游提供业务标签、关键词或地理信息，若无则返回 {}。
+    输出要求：
+      • 返回合法 JSON，confidence ∈ [0,1]，reason 使用中英文均可；
+      • route=ambiguous 时，应在 reason 中说明缺失的信息；
+      • 需知识库支持时，filters 至少包含与 query 相关的关键词列表。
+
+planner:
+  system: |-
+    你是 Planner，负责把 Reception 整理的上下文、Intent 决策和知识库结果整合为可执行方案。
+    输入结构包含：
+      • user_story：当前客户背景摘要；
+      • historical_user_messages：用户过往消息（含时间戳）；
+      • last_assistant_message：上一轮助手回复；
+      • current_user_message：本轮用户提问（主要依据）；
+      • intent：Intent Router 的原始判定；
+      • knowledge_notes：知识库 Specialist 的洞见（可为空）。
+    输出 JSON 字段：
+      • status：ok / need_more_info / escalate；
+      • draft_reply：写给 Reception 的专业草稿（使用 English）；
+      • notes：内部可见的结构化要点，可包含 SoloTask / Combination / Document / Background Requirement 推断；
+      • questions：需向客户追问的要点数组；
+      • actions：按顺序给出后续动作，每项包含 type (kb_lookup / llm_response / handoff 等) 与 payload。
+    规划原则：
+      • 参照 StructureRelation.yaml，识别客户需求对应的业务单元及前置条件；
+      • 信息不足时设为 need_more_info，并明确补充项；
+      • escalate 仅在政策冲突、资料缺失且无法自动处理时触发，并在 notes 中说明原因；
+      • draft_reply 应事实准确、结构清晰，便于 Reception 再润色。
+
+visa_kb:
+  system: |-
+    你是 Visa Knowledge Base Specialist，负责使用结构化签证资料库回答客户问题。
+    输入结构包括：
+      • query：当前用户问题；
+      • filters：Intent Agent 给出的业务标签或关键词；
+      • conversation_preamble：包含 user_story、历史用户消息、上一轮助手回复、当前用户消息等信息。
+    知识结构概要（详见 StructureRelation.yaml）：
+      • SoloTask：单一签证业务单元，定义输入材料（Document）、输出、背景条件；
+      • Combination：由多个 SoloTask 组合成的方案，涉及固定或临时组合、依赖顺序、共享材料；
+      • Document：业务所需材料；区分客户提交与内部生成；
+      • Background Requirement：业务执行前的必要条件，如地域、关系、签证状态；
+      • Reasoning pathway：评估业务可行性的逻辑步骤。
+    可调用的工具：
+      • visa_kb_list_documents：列出目标业务相关的 Document；
+      • visa_kb_read_document：读取文档片段获取细节或注意事项；
+      • visa_kb_search：按关键词检索业务描述、背景要求、流程。
+    输出内容建议：
+      1. 业务概述：指出适用的 SoloTask / Combination 及选择依据；
+      2. 材料清单：区分客户提交材料与内部生成物；
+      3. 背景核查：列出必须满足的条件或需确认的信息；
+      4. 操作建议：给出下一步行动或备选方案；
+      5. 来源引用：使用「来源：<路径或文档>」格式列出至少一条。
+    若检索结果缺失：
+      • 说明已尝试的关键词、工具；
+      • 建议升级人工或引导客户提供更多信息。
+    表达要求：
+      • 回答使用中文，关键业务术语保持英文形式（visa、passport、SoloTask 等）；
+      • 先给出结论，再列要点，语气专业可信；
+      • 所有结论须有据可依，不得臆测法规或背景。
*** End Patch

    你是 Intent Router，需要根据统一结构化上下文输出 JSON 决策，字段包括 route / confidence / reason / filters。
    提供的信息包含：
      • user_story：对客户风格与业务背景的当前总结；
      • historical_user_messages：按时间排序的用户过往消息；

      • current_user_message：本轮用户提问（决策时优先考虑）；

      • command：明确要求执行某项操作（提交、修改、预约等）。
    判断策略：
      • 当前消息是主要依据，同时结合 user_story、最近对话判断是否延续既有主题；
      • 出现 SoloTask、Combination、Document、Background Requirement 等业务关键词时，可偏向 visa_kb；
      • filters 用于给下游提供业务标签、关键词或地理信息，无需时返回 {}。
    输出要求：
      • 返回合法 JSON，confidence ∈ [0,1]，reason 可用中文或英文；
      • route=ambiguous 时，在 reason 中说明缺失的关键信息；
      • 需要知识库时，filters 至少包含相关关键词或业务标签。

planner:
  system: |-
    你是 Planner，负责把 Reception 整理的上下文、Intent 判定以及知识库结果整合为可执行方案。
    输入结构包含：
      • user_story：客户背景摘要；
      • historical_user_messages：近期用户消息（含时间戳）；
      • last_assistant_message：上一轮助理回复；
      • current_user_message：本轮用户提问；
      • intent：Intent Router 的原始输出；
      • knowledge_notes：知识库 Specialist 的洞见（可能为空）。
    输出 JSON 字段：
      • status：ok / need_more_info / escalate；
      • draft_reply：写给 Reception 的专业草稿（使用 English）；
      • notes：内部可见的结构化要点，可包含 SoloTask / Combination / Document / Background Requirement 推断；
      • questions：需要向客户追问的要点数组；
      • actions：按执行顺序列出后续动作，每项包含 type (kb_lookup / llm_response / handoff 等) 与 payload。
    规划原则：
      • 参考 StructureRelation.yaml 识别对应的业务单元及前置条件；
      • 信息不足时设为 need_more_info，并明确补充项；
      • escalate 仅在政策冲突或资料缺失且无法自动处理时触发，并在 notes 中说明；
      • draft_reply 应事实准确、结构清晰，帮助 Reception 快速润色。

visa_kb:
  system: |-
    你是 Visa Knowledge Base Specialist，负责使用结构化签证资料库回答客户问题。
    输入结构包括：
      • query：当前用户问题；
      • filters：Intent 提供的业务标签或关键词；
      • conversation_preamble：包含 user_story、历史用户消息、上一轮助理回复、当前用户消息等关键信息。
    知识结构概要（详见 StructureRelation.yaml）：
      • SoloTask：单一签证业务单元，定义输入材料、输出结果、背景条件；
      • Combination：由多个 SoloTask 组合的方案，需要考虑依赖顺序和共享材料；
      • Document：业务所需材料，区分客户提交与内部生成；
      • Background Requirement：业务执行前的必要条件；
      • Reasoning pathway：评估业务可行性的逻辑步骤。
    可调用的工具：
      • visa_kb_list_documents：列出目标业务相关 Document；
      • visa_kb_read_document：读取文档片段，核对细节或注意事项；
      • visa_kb_search：按关键词检索业务描述、背景要求、流程。
    输出建议：
      1. 业务概述：指出适用的 SoloTask / Combination 及选择依据；
      2. 材料清单：区分客户提交材料与内部生成物；
      3. 背景核查：列出必须满足的条件或需进一步确认的要点；
      4. 操作建议：说明下一步行动或备选路径；
      5. 来源引用：使用「来源：<路径或文档>」格式列出至少一条。
    若检索结果缺失：
      • 说明尝试过的工具与关键词；
      • 建议升级人工或引导客户提供更多信息。
    表达要求：
      • 回答使用中文，关键业务术语保留英文（如 visa、passport、SoloTask 等）；
      • 先给出结论，再列要点，语气专业可信；
      • 所有结论需有据可依，不得臆测法规或背景。
'@; Set-Content -Path 'TelegramBot\config\PromptConfig.yaml' -Value $yaml -Encoding utf8"]}

payload.arguments:
{"command":["pwsh.exe","-NoLogo","-Command","Set-Location 'D:\AI_Projects\Kobe'; $content = @'
# PromptStructureExample

## 场景概述
- 客户场景：群聊用户连续发言，其中最新一条是「我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？」。
- 上一轮助理回复：假设上一条机器人回复是基于 Planner 草稿的欢迎语。
- Redis 结构：
  - `historical_user_messages`：仅存放用户历史消息（含时间戳）。
  - `last_assistant_message`：上一轮助理回复。
  - `latest_user_message`：本轮待处理的用户消息。
  - `user_story`：Reception 对用户风格与业务背景的动态摘要。

示例时间线（UTC）：
| 序号 | 角色 | 时间 | 内容 |
| ---- | ---- | ---- | ---- |
| 1 | user | 2025-10-19T00:37:05Z | 你好啊 |
| 2 | assistant | 2025-10-19T00:37:10Z | 您好，很高兴认识您！请问有什么可以帮忙的？ |
| 3 | user (latest) | 2025-10-19T00:39:12Z | 我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？ |
| user_story | — | 风格：较为随和；主要诉求：尚未提供具体业务需求；待补充：等待客户说明具体问题。 |

---

## 1. ReceptionAgent.run 生成的上下文切片
Reception 不调用 LLM，只把 Redis 中的结构化数据拼成统一的 `conversation_preamble`，供后续 Agent 使用：

```text
now: 2025-10-19 08:39
user_story: 风格：较为随和；主要诉求：尚未提供具体业务需求；待补充：等待客户说明具体问题。
historical_user_messages:
  - [2025-10-19T00:37:05Z] historical.user: 你好啊
last_assistant_reply:
  - [2025-10-19T00:37:10Z] historical.assistant: 您好，很高兴认识您！请问有什么可以帮忙的？
current_user_message:
  - [2025-10-19T00:39:12Z] current.user: 我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？
```

输出对象 `ReceptionResult` 结构：
```json
{
  "user_message": {"role": "user", "content": "我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？", "timestamp": "2025-10-19T00:39:12Z"},
  "historical_user_messages": [
    {"role": "user", "content": "你好啊", "timestamp": "2025-10-19T00:37:05Z"}
  ],
  "last_assistant_message": {"role": "assistant", "content": "您好，很高兴认识您！请问有什么可以帮忙的？", "timestamp": "2025-10-19T00:37:10Z"},
  "user_story": "风格：较为随和；主要诉求：尚未提供具体业务需求；待补充：等待客户说明具体问题。",
  "conversation_preamble": "now: ...\nuser_story: ...\nhistorical_user_messages: ..."
}
```

---

## 2. IntentAgent Prompt
### System Prompt
见 `PromptConfig.yaml` 的 `intent_router.system`（已说明结构化上下文字段）。

### User Prompt（传给 LLM 的 payload）
```json
{
  "text": "我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？",
  "conversation_context": "now: 2025-10-19 08:39\nuser_story: 风格：较为随和；主要诉求：尚未提供具体业务需求；待补充：等待客户说明具体问题。\nhistorical_user_messages:\n  - [2025-10-19T00:37:05Z] historical.user: 你好啊\nlast_assistant_reply:\n  - [2025-10-19T00:37:10Z] historical.assistant: 您好，很高兴认识您！请问有什么可以帮忙的？\ncurrent_user_message:\n  - [2025-10-19T00:39:12Z] current.user: 我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？"
}
```

### 预期 LLM 输出
```json
{
  "route": "visa_kb",
  "confidence": 0.90,
  "reason": "客户询问旅游签证过期的处理方式，属于签证业务咨询。",
  "filters": {"keywords": ["旅游签证", "过期"]}
}
```

---

## 3. PlannerAgent Prompt
### System Prompt
见 `PromptConfig.yaml` 的 `planner.system`。

### User Payload
```json
{
  "user_story": "风格：较为随和；主要诉求：尚未提供具体业务需求；待补充：等待客户说明具体问题。",
  "historical_user_messages": [
    {"role": "user", "content": "你好啊", "timestamp": "2025-10-19T00:37:05Z"}
  ],
  "last_assistant_message": {
    "role": "assistant",
    "content": "您好，很高兴认识您！请问有什么可以帮忙的？",
    "timestamp": "2025-10-19T00:37:10Z"
  },
  "current_user_message": {
    "role": "user",
    "content": "我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？",
    "timestamp": "2025-10-19T00:39:12Z"
  },
  "intent": {
    "route": "visa_kb",
    "confidence": 0.9,
    "filters": {"keywords": ["旅游签证", "过期"]}
  },
  "knowledge_notes": ""
}
```

### Planner 输出示例
```json
{
  "status": "need_more_info",
  "draft_reply": "Thanks for reaching out. To determine the overstay remedy we need your current location and the visa class involved.",
  "notes": "关注 SoloTask_TourismVisa_OverstayHandling，需确认是否仍在签发国、超期时长。",
  "questions": [
    "请确认是否仍在签证签发国境内？",
    "签证超期多久？",
    "原签证类别是哪一种？"
  ],
  "actions": [
    {
      "type": "kb_lookup",
      "payload": {
        "keywords": ["旅游签证", "过期", "罚款"],
        "filters": {"route": "visa_kb"}
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## 4. VisaKnowledgeBaseAgent Prompt
### System Prompt
见 `PromptConfig.yaml` 的 `visa_kb.system`。

### User Payload
```json
{
  "query": "我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？",
  "filters": {"keywords": ["旅游签证", "过期"]},
  "conversation_preamble": "now: 2025-10-19 08:39\nuser_story: 风格：较为随和；主要诉求：尚未提供具体业务需求；待补充：等待客户说明具体问题。\nhistorical_user_messages:\n  - [2025-10-19T00:37:05Z] historical.user: 你好啊\nlast_assistant_reply:\n  - [2025-10-19T00:37:10Z] historical.assistant: 您好，很高兴认识您！请问有什么可以帮忙的？\ncurrent_user_message:\n  - [2025-10-19T00:39:12Z] current.user: 我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？"
}
```

该 Agent 利用 user_story、filters 判断是否需要追加追问，或直接检索具体的 SoloTask/Combination，并通过工具获取所需材料、背景条件。

---

## 5. ReceptionAgent.craft_reply Prompt
### System Prompt
使用 `reception.reply` 提示词。

### User Prompt（传给 LLM 的合成文本）
```text
Latest user message:
我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？

Recent conversation (oldest -> newest):
  - [2025-10-19T00:37:05Z] historical.user: 你好啊
  - [2025-10-19T00:37:10Z] historical.assistant: 您好，很高兴认识您！请问有什么可以帮忙的？

Professional draft reply:
Thanks for reaching out. To determine the overstay remedy we need your current location and the visa class involved.

Knowledge-base notes:
(SoloTask_TourismVisa_OverstayHandling 建议确认地理前提、超期时长、罚款流程)

Produce your final response now.
```

### Reception 最终输出示例
```text
您好！为了帮您确定旅游签证超期后的处理方案，请先确认：
1. 您目前是否仍在原签证签发的国家境内？
2. 大约超期了多久？
3. 当时持有的签证类别（例如 B2、L 等）是哪一种？

确认这些信息后，我们就能帮您核查是否需要补缴罚金、提交哪些材料，以及是否可以走续签或转签途径。如情况紧急，请尽快主动与当地移民局沟通，以免产生额外滞纳费用。
```

### user_story 更新
Reception 综合 Planner 的 notes/questions 以及当前对话，将 `user_story` 更新为：
```
风格：偏详尽；主要诉求：旅游签证过期处理；待补充：确认当前所在地、超期时长、签证类别。
```
该值写回 Redis，供下一轮 Agents 使用。

---

## 总结
新的上下文机制把 Redis 数据拆分为：
1. 历史用户消息（含时间戳，仅用户侧）；
2. 上一轮助理回复；
3. 当前用户消息；
4. Reception 维护的 user_story。

所有 Agent 的 prompt 均显式引用这四段信息，使得意图判断、知识库检索和最终润色都能参考客户背景、上一轮对话和当前诉求，便于进一步调试提示词。

    async def craft_reply(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        """Rewrite planner output into the reception persona tone."""
        timeline = self._build_timeline(reception)
        timeline_block = "\n".join(timeline) if timeline else "(no recent turns)"

        kb_notes = ""
        if plan.kb_answer and plan.kb_answer.answer:
            kb_notes = plan.kb_answer.answer

        draft_reply = plan.reply or ""

        messages = [
            {"role": "system", "content": self.reply_prompt},
            {
                "role": "user",
                "content": (
                    f"Latest user message:\n{reception.user_message.content}\n\n"
                    f"Recent conversation (oldest -> newest):\n{timeline_block}\n\n"
                    f"Professional draft reply:\n{draft_reply or '(missing)'}\n\n"
                    f"Knowledge-base notes:\n{kb_notes or '(none)'}\n\n"
                    "Produce your final response now."
                ),
            },
        ]

        reply = ""
        try:
            response = create_response(
                messages=messages,
                model=get_model_name("reception", default=self.config.openai_model, bot_key=str(context.bot_id)),
                temperature=self.reply_temperature,
            )
            reply = extract_text(response)
        except Exception as exc:  # pragma: no cover - defensive
            logger.error("Reception rewrite failed, using draft reply: %s", exc, exc_info=True)

        if not reply.strip():
            reply = draft_reply or "Sorry, I��m unable to provide a complete answer right now. Please try again later."
        logger.info(
            "�Ӵ����ɳ�Ʒ�ظ�: ����=%s ��Դ�ڹ滮�ݸ�=%s",
            len(reply),
            "��" if draft_reply else "��",
        )

        updated_story = self._summarize_user_story(context, reception, plan, reply)
        context.user_story = updated_story

        return reply

    def _format_message_line(
        self,
        message: Optional[AgentMessage],
        speaker: str,
        *,
        label: str = "historical",
    ) -> str:
        if message is None:
            return "  (none)"
        timestamp = message.timestamp or "unknown"
        return f"  - [{timestamp}] {label}.{speaker}: {message.content}"

    def _format_history_block(self, messages: List[AgentMessage]) -> str:
        if not messages:
            return "  (none)"
        return "\n".join(self._format_message_line(msg, "user") for msg in messages)

    def _build_timeline(self, reception: ReceptionResult) -> List[str]:
        timeline: List[str] = []
        for msg in reception.historical_user_messages[-6:]:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(msg, "user"))
        if reception.last_assistant_message:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(reception.last_assistant_message, "assistant"))
        return timeline

from pathlib import Path
import textwrap
path = Path("TelegramBot/agents/reception_agent.py")
text = path.read_text(encoding="utf-8")
start_marker = "    def _summarize_user_story(\n"
start = text.find(start_marker)
if start == -1:
    raise SystemExit("start marker not found")
end_marker = "        return new_story\n"
end = text.find(end_marker, start)
if end == -1:
    raise SystemExit("end marker not found")
end = end + len(end_marker)
replacement = textwrap.dedent('''
    def _summarize_user_story(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
        final_reply: str,
    ) -> str:
        existing = context.user_story or ""

        messages = reception.historical_user_messages + [reception.user_message]
        lengths = [len(msg.content) for msg in messages if msg.content]
        avg_len = mean(lengths) if lengths else 0
        if avg_len >= 80:
            style = "偏话痨"
        elif avg_len >= 40:
            style = "偏详尽"
        else:
            style = "表达简洁"

        topic = plan.debug_info.get("notes") or reception.user_message.content
        topic = (topic or "").replace("\n", " ").strip() or "尚未明确诉求"

        pending_questions = plan.debug_info.get("questions") or plan.debug_info.get("planner_raw", {}).get("questions")
        if isinstance(pending_questions, list):
            pending = ", ".join(str(q) for q in pending_questions if q)
        else:
            pending = ""

        story_parts = [
            f"风格: {style}",
            f"主要诉求: {topic}",
        ]
        if pending:
            story_parts.append(f"待补充: {pending}")

        new_story = "; ".join(story_parts)
        if existing and existing != new_story:
            combined = f"{existing} | latest: {new_story}"
            if len(combined) > 600:
                combined = combined[-600:]
            return combined
        return new_story
''')
text = text[:start] + replacement + text[end:]
path.write_text(text, encoding="utf-8")

{"output":"from __future__ import annotations

from statistics import mean
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from typing import List, Optional

from TelegramBot.config.prompt_loader import get_prompt
from TelegramBot.config.model_config import get_model_name
from TelegramBot.config.settings import get_config
from TelegramBot.openai_runtime import create_response, extract_text
from SharedUtility.RichLogger.logger import RichLoggerManager

from .base import AgentContext, AgentMessage, BaseAgent, ReceptionResult, PlannerOutcome

logger = RichLoggerManager.for_node("telegram.reception", level=20)


def _now_iso() -> str:
    return datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat(timespec="seconds")


class ReceptionAgent(BaseAgent):
    """Reception persona responsible for greeting users and delivering final responses."""

    def __init__(
        self,
        *,
        max_history_messages: int = 50,
        reply_temperature: float = 0.85,
    ) -> None:
        self.max_history_messages = max_history_messages
        self.config = get_config()
        self.reply_temperature = reply_temperature
        self.reply_prompt = get_prompt("reception.reply")

    async def run(self, context: AgentContext, user_message: str) -> ReceptionResult:
        historical_users = context.historical_user_messages[-self.max_history_messages :] if context.historical_user_messages else []
        last_assistant = context.last_assistant_message
        current_user = context.current_user_message or AgentMessage(role="user", content=user_message, timestamp=_now_iso())

        history_section = self._format_history_block(historical_users)
        last_assistant_section = self._format_message_line(last_assistant, "assistant")
        current_section = self._format_message_line(current_user, "user", label="current")

        preamble = (
            f"now: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')}\n"
            f"user_story: {context.user_story or '(none)'}\n"
            "historical_user_messages:\n"
            f"{history_section}\n"
            "last_assistant_reply:\n"
            f"{last_assistant_section}\n"
            "current_user_message:\n"
            f"{current_section}"
        )

        return ReceptionResult(
            user_message=current_user,
            historical_user_messages=historical_users,
            last_assistant_message=last_assistant,
            conversation_preamble=preamble,
            user_story=context.user_story,
        )

    async def craft_reply(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        """Rewrite planner output into the reception persona tone."""
        timeline = self._build_timeline(reception)
        timeline_block = "\n".join(timeline) if timeline else "(no recent turns)"

        kb_notes = ""
        if plan.kb_answer and plan.kb_answer.answer:
            kb_notes = plan.kb_answer.answer

        draft_reply = plan.reply or ""

        messages = [
            {"role": "system", "content": self.reply_prompt},
            {
                "role": "user",
                "content": (
                    f"Latest user message:\n{reception.user_message.content}\n\n"
                    f"Recent conversation (oldest -> newest):\n{timeline_block}\n\n"
                    f"Professional draft reply:\n{draft_reply or '(missing)'}\n\n"
                    f"Knowledge-base notes:\n{kb_notes or '(none)'}\n\n"
                    "Produce your final response now."
                ),
            },
        ]

        reply = ""
        try:
            response = create_response(
                messages=messages,
                model=get_model_name("reception", default=self.config.openai_model, bot_key=str(context.bot_id)),
                temperature=self.reply_temperature,
            )
            reply = extract_text(response)
        except Exception as exc:  # pragma: no cover - defensive
            logger.error("Reception rewrite failed, using draft reply: %s", exc, exc_info=True)

        if not reply.strip():
            reply = draft_reply or "Sorry, I'm unable to provide a complete answer right now. Please try again later."
        logger.info(
            "Reception reply generated: length=%s from_planner=%s",
            len(reply),
            "yes" if draft_reply else "no",
        )

        updated_story = self._summarize_user_story(context, reception, plan, reply)
        context.user_story = updated_story

        return reply

    def _format_message_line(
        self,
        message: Optional[AgentMessage],
        speaker: str,
        *,
        label: str = "historical",
    ) -> str:
        if message is None:
            return "  (none)"
        timestamp = message.timestamp or "unknown"
        return f"  - [{timestamp}] {label}.{speaker}: {message.content}"

    def _format_history_block(self, messages: List[AgentMessage]) -> str:
        if not messages:
            return "  (none)"
        return "\n".join(self._format_message_line(msg, "user") for msg in messages)

    def _build_timeline(self, reception: ReceptionResult) -> List[str]:
        timeline: List[str] = []

            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(msg, "user"))
        if reception.last_assistant_message:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(reception.last_assistant_message, "assistant"))
        return timeline

    def _summarize_user_story(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,

from statistics import mean

from TelegramBot.config.prompt_loader import get_prompt

        historical_users = context.historical_user_messages[-self.max_history_messages :] if context.historical_user_messages else []

        last_assistant_section = self._format_message_line(last_assistant, "assistant")
        current_section = self._format_message_line(current_user, "user", label="current")

        preamble = (
            f"now: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')}\n"
            f"user_story: {context.user_story or '(none)'}\n"

            f"{history_section}\n"
            "last_assistant_reply:\n"
            f"{last_assistant_section}\n"
            "current_user_message:\n"
            f"{current_section}"
        )

        return ReceptionResult(
            user_message=current_user,
            historical_user_messages=historical_users,
            last_assistant_message=last_assistant,
            conversation_preamble=preamble,
            user_story=context.user_story,
        )

    async def craft_reply(
        self,

                    "Produce your final response now."
                ),
            },

                messages=messages,

        new_story = "; ".join(story_parts)

            combined = f"{existing} | latest: {new_story}"

        return new_story

from statistics import mean
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from typing import List, Optional

from TelegramBot.config.prompt_loader import get_prompt
from TelegramBot.config.model_config import get_model_name
from TelegramBot.config.settings import get_config
from TelegramBot.openai_runtime import create_response, extract_text
from SharedUtility.RichLogger.logger import RichLoggerManager

from .base import AgentContext, AgentMessage, BaseAgent, ReceptionResult, PlannerOutcome

logger = RichLoggerManager.for_node("telegram.reception", level=20)


def _now_iso() -> str:
    return datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat(timespec="seconds")


class ReceptionAgent(BaseAgent):
    """Reception persona responsible for greeting users and delivering final responses."""

    def __init__(
        self,
        *,
        max_history_messages: int = 50,
        reply_temperature: float = 0.85,
    ) -> None:
        self.max_history_messages = max_history_messages
        self.config = get_config()
        self.reply_temperature = reply_temperature
        self.reply_prompt = get_prompt("reception.reply")

    async def run(self, context: AgentContext, user_message: str) -> ReceptionResult:
        historical_users = context.historical_user_messages[-self.max_history_messages :] if context.historical_user_messages else []
        last_assistant = context.last_assistant_message
        current_user = context.current_user_message or AgentMessage(role="user", content=user_message, timestamp=_now_iso())

        history_section = self._format_history_block(historical_users)
        last_assistant_section = self._format_message_line(last_assistant, "assistant")
        current_section = self._format_message_line(current_user, "user", label="current")

        preamble = (
            f"now: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')}\n"
            f"user_story: {context.user_story or '(none)'}\n"
            "historical_user_messages:\n"
            f"{history_section}\n"
            "last_assistant_reply:\n"
            f"{last_assistant_section}\n"
            "current_user_message:\n"
            f"{current_section}"
        )

        return ReceptionResult(
            user_message=current_user,
            historical_user_messages=historical_users,
            last_assistant_message=last_assistant,
            conversation_preamble=preamble,
            user_story=context.user_story,
        )

    async def craft_reply(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        """Rewrite planner output into the reception persona tone."""
        timeline = self._build_timeline(reception)
        timeline_block = "\n".join(timeline) if timeline else "(no recent turns)"

        kb_notes = ""
        if plan.kb_answer and plan.kb_answer.answer:
            kb_notes = plan.kb_answer.answer

        draft_reply = plan.reply or ""

        messages = [
            {"role": "system", "content": self.reply_prompt},
            {
                "role": "user",
                "content": (
                    f"Latest user message:\n{reception.user_message.content}\n\n"
                    f"Recent conversation (oldest -> newest):\n{timeline_block}\n\n"
                    f"Professional draft reply:\n{draft_reply or '(missing)'}\n\n"
                    f"Knowledge-base notes:\n{kb_notes or '(none)'}\n\n"
                    "Produce your final response now."
                ),
            },
        ]

        reply = ""
        try:
            response = create_response(
                messages=messages,
                model=get_model_name("reception", default=self.config.openai_model, bot_key=str(context.bot_id)),
                temperature=self.reply_temperature,
            )
            reply = extract_text(response)
        except Exception as exc:  # pragma: no cover - defensive
            logger.error("Reception rewrite failed, using draft reply: %s", exc, exc_info=True)

        if not reply.strip():
            reply = draft_reply or "Sorry, I'm unable to provide a complete answer right now. Please try again later."
        logger.info(
            "Reception reply generated: length=%s from_planner=%s",
            len(reply),
            "yes" if draft_reply else "no",
        )

        updated_story = self._summarize_user_story(context, reception, plan)
        context.user_story = updated_story

        return reply

    def _format_message_line(
        self,
        message: Optional[AgentMessage],
        speaker: str,
        *,
        label: str = "historical",
    ) -> str:
        if message is None:
            return "  (none)"
        timestamp = message.timestamp or "unknown"
        return f"  - [{timestamp}] {label}.{speaker}: {message.content}"

    def _format_history_block(self, messages: List[AgentMessage]) -> str:
        if not messages:
            return "  (none)"
        return "\n".join(self._format_message_line(msg, "user") for msg in messages)

    def _build_timeline(self, reception: ReceptionResult) -> List[str]:
        timeline: List[str] = []
        for msg in reception.historical_user_messages[-6:]:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(msg, "user"))
        if reception.last_assistant_message:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(reception.last_assistant_message, "assistant"))
        return timeline

    def _summarize_user_story(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        existing = context.user_story or ""

        messages = reception.historical_user_messages + [reception.user_message]
        lengths = [len(msg.content) for msg in messages if msg.content]

        if avg_len >= 80:

        elif avg_len >= 40:
            style = "ƫ�꾡"
        else:
            style = "������"

        topic = plan.debug_info.get("notes") or reception.user_message.content
        topic = (topic or "").replace("
", " ").strip() or "��δ��ȷ����"

        pending_questions = plan.debug_info.get("questions") or plan.debug_info.get("planner_raw", {}).get("questions")

from __future__ import annotations

from statistics import mean
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from typing import List, Optional

from TelegramBot.config.prompt_loader import get_prompt
from TelegramBot.config.model_config import get_model_name
from TelegramBot.config.settings import get_config
from TelegramBot.openai_runtime import create_response, extract_text
from SharedUtility.RichLogger.logger import RichLoggerManager

from .base import AgentContext, AgentMessage, BaseAgent, ReceptionResult, PlannerOutcome

logger = RichLoggerManager.for_node("telegram.reception", level=20)


def _now_iso() -> str:
    return datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat(timespec="seconds")


class ReceptionAgent(BaseAgent):
    """Reception persona responsible for greeting users and delivering final responses."""

    def __init__(
        self,
        *,
        max_history_messages: int = 50,
        reply_temperature: float = 0.85,
    ) -> None:
        self.max_history_messages = max_history_messages
        self.config = get_config()
        self.reply_temperature = reply_temperature
        self.reply_prompt = get_prompt("reception.reply")

    async def run(self, context: AgentContext, user_message: str) -> ReceptionResult:
        historical_users = context.historical_user_messages[-self.max_history_messages :] if context.historical_user_messages else []
        last_assistant = context.last_assistant_message
        current_user = context.current_user_message or AgentMessage(role="user", content=user_message, timestamp=_now_iso())

        history_section = self._format_history_block(historical_users)
        last_assistant_section = self._format_message_line(last_assistant, "assistant")
        current_section = self._format_message_line(current_user, "user", label="current")

        preamble = (
            f"now: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')}\n"
            f"user_story: {context.user_story or '(none)'}\n"
            "historical_user_messages:\n"
            f"{history_section}\n"
            "last_assistant_reply:\n"
            f"{last_assistant_section}\n"
            "current_user_message:\n"
            f"{current_section}"
        )

        return ReceptionResult(
            user_message=current_user,
            historical_user_messages=historical_users,
            last_assistant_message=last_assistant,
            conversation_preamble=preamble,
            user_story=context.user_story,
        )

    async def craft_reply(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        """Rewrite planner output into the reception persona tone."""
        timeline = self._build_timeline(reception)
        timeline_block = "\n".join(timeline) if timeline else "(no recent turns)"

        kb_notes = ""
        if plan.kb_answer and plan.kb_answer.answer:
            kb_notes = plan.kb_answer.answer

        draft_reply = plan.reply or ""

        messages = [
            {"role": "system", "content": self.reply_prompt},
            {
                "role": "user",
                "content": (
                    f"Latest user message:\n{reception.user_message.content}\n\n"
                    f"Recent conversation (oldest -> newest):\n{timeline_block}\n\n"
                    f"Professional draft reply:\n{draft_reply or '(missing)'}\n\n"
                    f"Knowledge-base notes:\n{kb_notes or '(none)'}\n\n"
                    "Produce your final response now."
                ),
            },
        ]

        reply = ""
        try:
            response = create_response(
                messages=messages,
                model=get_model_name("reception", default=self.config.openai_model, bot_key=str(context.bot_id)),
                temperature=self.reply_temperature,
            )
            reply = extract_text(response)
        except Exception as exc:  # pragma: no cover - defensive
            logger.error("Reception rewrite failed, using draft reply: %s", exc, exc_info=True)

        if not reply.strip():
            reply = draft_reply or "Sorry, I'm unable to provide a complete answer right now. Please try again later."
        logger.info(
            "Reception reply generated: length=%s from_planner=%s",
            len(reply),
            "yes" if draft_reply else "no",
        )

        context.user_story = self._summarize_user_story(context, reception, plan)
        return reply

    def _format_message_line(
        self,
        message: Optional[AgentMessage],
        speaker: str,
        *,
        label: str = "historical",
    ) -> str:
        if message is None:
            return "  (none)"
        timestamp = message.timestamp or "unknown"
        return f"  - [{timestamp}] {label}.{speaker}: {message.content}"

    def _format_history_block(self, messages: List[AgentMessage]) -> str:
        if not messages:
            return "  (none)"
        return "\n".join(self._format_message_line(msg, "user") for msg in messages)

    def _build_timeline(self, reception: ReceptionResult) -> List[str]:
        timeline: List[str] = []
        for msg in reception.historical_user_messages[-6:]:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(msg, "user"))
        if reception.last_assistant_message:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(reception.last_assistant_message, "assistant"))
        return timeline

    def _summarize_user_story(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        existing = context.user_story or ""

        messages = reception.historical_user_messages + [reception.user_message]
        lengths = [len(msg.content) for msg in messages if msg.content]
        avg_len = mean(lengths) if lengths else 0
        if avg_len >= 80:
            style = "偏话痨"
        elif avg_len >= 40:
            style = "偏详尽"
        else:
            style = "表达简洁"

        topic = plan.debug_info.get("notes") or reception.user_message.content
        topic = (topic or "").replace("\n", " ").strip() or "尚未明确诉求"

        pending_questions = plan.debug_info.get("questions") or plan.debug_info.get("planner_raw", {}).get("questions")
        if isinstance(pending_questions, list):
            pending = ", ".join(str(q) for q in pending_questions if q)
        else:
            pending = ""

        story_parts = [
            f"风格: {style}",
            f"主要诉求: {topic}",
        ]
        if pending:
            story_parts.append(f"待补充: {pending}")

        new_story = "; ".join(story_parts)
        if existing and existing != new_story:
            combined = f"{existing} | latest: {new_story}"
            if len(combined) > 600:
                combined = combined[-600:]
            return combined
        return new_story

I'm sorting through why replaced Unicode `\u` sequences turn into actual characters rather than staying as escaped ASCII sequences. It looks like Python interprets single backslashes in string literals, so I may need to double-escape them to preserve the literal `\u` text. Still, the final file containing real Chinese characters is OK for UTF-8 but might appear as gibberish in some terminals, though it shouldn't affect functionality. I want to finalize by updating ASCII strings in YAML and recompile all Python files to check syntax.

{"output":"from __future__ import annotations

from statistics import mean
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from typing import List, Optional

from TelegramBot.config.prompt_loader import get_prompt
from TelegramBot.config.model_config import get_model_name
from TelegramBot.config.settings import get_config
from TelegramBot.openai_runtime import create_response, extract_text
from SharedUtility.RichLogger.logger import RichLoggerManager

from .base import AgentContext, AgentMessage, BaseAgent, ReceptionResult, PlannerOutcome

logger = RichLoggerManager.for_node("telegram.reception", level=20)


def _now_iso() -> str:
    return datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat(timespec="seconds")


class ReceptionAgent(BaseAgent):
    """Reception persona responsible for greeting users and delivering final responses."""

    def __init__(
        self,
        *,
        max_history_messages: int = 50,
        reply_temperature: float = 0.85,
    ) -> None:
        self.max_history_messages = max_history_messages
        self.config = get_config()
        self.reply_temperature = reply_temperature
        self.reply_prompt = get_prompt("reception.reply")

    async def run(self, context: AgentContext, user_message: str) -> ReceptionResult:
        historical_users = context.historical_user_messages[-self.max_history_messages :] if context.historical_user_messages else []
        last_assistant = context.last_assistant_message
        current_user = context.current_user_message or AgentMessage(role="user", content=user_message, timestamp=_now_iso())

        history_section = self._format_history_block(historical_users)
        last_assistant_section = self._format_message_line(last_assistant, "assistant")
        current_section = self._format_message_line(current_user, "user", label="current")

        preamble = (
            f"now: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')}\n"
            f"user_story: {context.user_story or '(none)'}\n"
            "historical_user_messages:\n"
            f"{history_section}\n"
            "last_assistant_reply:\n"
            f"{last_assistant_section}\n"
            "current_user_message:\n"
            f"{current_section}"
        )

        return ReceptionResult(
            user_message=current_user,
            historical_user_messages=historical_users,
            last_assistant_message=last_assistant,
            conversation_preamble=preamble,
            user_story=context.user_story,
        )

    async def craft_reply(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        """Rewrite planner output into the reception persona tone."""
        timeline = self._build_timeline(reception)
        timeline_block = "\n".join(timeline) if timeline else "(no recent turns)"

        kb_notes = ""
        if plan.kb_answer and plan.kb_answer.answer:
            kb_notes = plan.kb_answer.answer

        draft_reply = plan.reply or ""

        messages = [
            {"role": "system", "content": self.reply_prompt},
            {
                "role": "user",
                "content": (
                    f"Latest user message:\n{reception.user_message.content}\n\n"
                    f"Recent conversation (oldest -> newest):\n{timeline_block}\n\n"
                    f"Professional draft reply:\n{draft_reply or '(missing)'}\n\n"
                    f"Knowledge-base notes:\n{kb_notes or '(none)'}\n\n"
                    "Produce your final response now."
                ),
            },
        ]

        reply = ""
        try:
            response = create_response(
                messages=messages,
                model=get_model_name("reception", default=self.config.openai_model, bot_key=str(context.bot_id)),
                temperature=self.reply_temperature,
            )
            reply = extract_text(response)
        except Exception as exc:  # pragma: no cover - defensive
            logger.error("Reception rewrite failed, using draft reply: %s", exc, exc_info=True)

        if not reply.strip():
            reply = draft_reply or "Sorry, I'm unable to provide a complete answer right now. Please try again later."
        logger.info(
            "Reception reply generated: length=%s from_planner=%s",
            len(reply),
            "yes" if draft_reply else "no",
        )

        context.user_story = self._summarize_user_story(context, reception, plan)
        return reply

    def _format_message_line(
        self,
        message: Optional[AgentMessage],
        speaker: str,
        *,
        label: str = "historical",
    ) -> str:
        if message is None:
            return "  (none)"
        timestamp = message.timestamp or "unknown"
        return f"  - [{timestamp}] {label}.{speaker}: {message.content}"

    def _format_history_block(self, messages: List[AgentMessage]) -> str:
        if not messages:
            return "  (none)"
        return "\n".join(self._format_message_line(msg, "user") for msg in messages)

    def _build_timeline(self, reception: ReceptionResult) -> List[str]:
        timeline: List[str] = []
        for msg in reception.historical_user_messages[-6:]:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(msg, "user"))
        if reception.last_assistant_message:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(reception.last_assistant_message, "assistant"))
        return timeline

    def _summarize_user_story(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        existing = context.user_story or ""

        messages = reception.historical_user_messages + [reception.user_message]
        lengths = [len(msg.content) for msg in messages if msg.content]
        avg_len = mean(lengths) if lengths else 0
        if avg_len >= 80:
            style = "ƫ����"
        elif avg_len >= 40:
            style = "ƫ�꾡"
        else:
            style = "������"

        topic = plan.debug_info.get("notes") or reception.user_message.content
        topic = (topic or "").replace("\n", " ").strip() or "\u5c1a\u672a\u660e\u786e\u8bc9\u6c42"

        pending_questions = plan.debug_info.get("questions") or plan.debug_info.get("planner_raw", {}).get("questions")
        if isinstance(pending_questions, list):
            pending = ", ".join(str(q) for q in pending_questions if q)
        else:
            pending = ""

        story_parts = [
            f"\u98ce\u683c: {style}",
            f"\u4e3b\u8981\u8bc9\u6c42: {topic}",
        ]
        if pending:
            story_parts.append(f"\u5f85\u8865\u5145: {pending}")

        new_story = "; ".join(story_parts)
        if existing and existing != new_story:
            combined = f"{existing} | latest: {new_story}"
            if len(combined) > 600:
                combined = combined[-600:]
            return combined
        return new_story

        story_parts = [

            return combined
        return new_story

from __future__ import annotations

from statistics import mean
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from typing import List, Optional

from TelegramBot.config.prompt_loader import get_prompt
from TelegramBot.config.model_config import get_model_name
from TelegramBot.config.settings import get_config
from TelegramBot.openai_runtime import create_response, extract_text
from SharedUtility.RichLogger.logger import RichLoggerManager

from .base import AgentContext, AgentMessage, BaseAgent, ReceptionResult, PlannerOutcome

logger = RichLoggerManager.for_node("telegram.reception", level=20)


def _now_iso() -> str:
    return datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat(timespec="seconds")


class ReceptionAgent(BaseAgent):
    """Reception persona responsible for greeting users and delivering final responses."""

    def __init__(
        self,
        *,
        max_history_messages: int = 50,
        reply_temperature: float = 0.85,
    ) -> None:
        self.max_history_messages = max_history_messages
        self.config = get_config()
        self.reply_temperature = reply_temperature
        self.reply_prompt = get_prompt("reception.reply")

    async def run(self, context: AgentContext, user_message: str) -> ReceptionResult:
        historical_users = context.historical_user_messages[-self.max_history_messages :] if context.historical_user_messages else []
        last_assistant = context.last_assistant_message
        current_user = context.current_user_message or AgentMessage(role="user", content=user_message, timestamp=_now_iso())

        history_section = self._format_history_block(historical_users)
        last_assistant_section = self._format_message_line(last_assistant, "assistant")
        current_section = self._format_message_line(current_user, "user", label="current")

        preamble = (
            f"now: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')}\n"
            f"user_story: {context.user_story or '(none)'}\n"
            "historical_user_messages:\n"
            f"{history_section}\n"
            "last_assistant_reply:\n"
            f"{last_assistant_section}\n"
            "current_user_message:\n"
            f"{current_section}"
        )

        return ReceptionResult(
            user_message=current_user,
            historical_user_messages=historical_users,
            last_assistant_message=last_assistant,
            conversation_preamble=preamble,
            user_story=context.user_story,
        )

    async def craft_reply(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        """Rewrite planner output into the reception persona tone."""
        timeline = self._build_timeline(reception)
        timeline_block = "\n".join(timeline) if timeline else "(no recent turns)"

        kb_notes = ""
        if plan.kb_answer and plan.kb_answer.answer:
            kb_notes = plan.kb_answer.answer

        draft_reply = plan.reply or ""

        messages = [
            {"role": "system", "content": self.reply_prompt},
            {
                "role": "user",
                "content": (
                    f"Latest user message:\n{reception.user_message.content}\n\n"
                    f"Recent conversation (oldest -> newest):\n{timeline_block}\n\n"
                    f"Professional draft reply:\n{draft_reply or '(missing)'}\n\n"
                    f"Knowledge-base notes:\n{kb_notes or '(none)'}\n\n"
                    "Produce your final response now."
                ),
            },
        ]

        reply = ""
        try:
            response = create_response(
                messages=messages,
                model=get_model_name("reception", default=self.config.openai_model, bot_key=str(context.bot_id)),
                temperature=self.reply_temperature,
            )
            reply = extract_text(response)
        except Exception as exc:  # pragma: no cover - defensive
            logger.error("Reception rewrite failed, using draft reply: %s", exc, exc_info=True)

        if not reply.strip():
            reply = draft_reply or "Sorry, I'm unable to provide a complete answer right now. Please try again later."
        logger.info(
            "Reception reply generated: length=%s from_planner=%s",
            len(reply),
            "yes" if draft_reply else "no",
        )

        context.user_story = self._summarize_user_story(context, reception, plan)
        return reply

    def _format_message_line(
        self,
        message: Optional[AgentMessage],
        speaker: str,
        *,
        label: str = "historical",
    ) -> str:
        if message is None:
            return "  (none)"
        timestamp = message.timestamp or "unknown"
        return f"  - [{timestamp}] {label}.{speaker}: {message.content}"

    def _format_history_block(self, messages: List[AgentMessage]) -> str:
        if not messages:
            return "  (none)"
        return "\n".join(self._format_message_line(msg, "user") for msg in messages)

    def _build_timeline(self, reception: ReceptionResult) -> List[str]:
        timeline: List[str] = []
        for msg in reception.historical_user_messages[-6:]:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(msg, "user"))
        if reception.last_assistant_message:
            timeline.append(self._format_message_line(reception.last_assistant_message, "assistant"))
        return timeline

    def _summarize_user_story(
        self,
        context: AgentContext,
        reception: ReceptionResult,
        plan: PlannerOutcome,
    ) -> str:
        existing = context.user_story or ""

        messages = reception.historical_user_messages + [reception.user_message]
        lengths = [len(msg.content) for msg in messages if msg.content]
        avg_len = mean(lengths) if lengths else 0
        if avg_len >= 80:
            style = "\u504f\u8bdd\u75af"
        elif avg_len >= 40:
            style = "\u504f\u8be6\u5c3d"
        else:
            style = "\u8868\u8fbe\u7b80\u6d01"

        topic = plan.debug_info.get("notes") or reception.user_message.content
        topic = (topic or "").replace("\n", " ").strip() or "\u5c1a\u672a\u660e\u786e\u8bc9\u6c42"

        pending_questions = plan.debug_info.get("questions") or plan.debug_info.get("planner_raw", {}).get("questions")
        if isinstance(pending_questions, list):
            pending = ", ".join(str(q) for q in pending_questions if q)
        else:
            pending = ""

        story_parts = [
            f"\u98ce\u683c: {style}",
            f"\u4e3b\u8981\u8bc9\u6c42: {topic}",
        ]
        if pending:
            story_parts.append(f"\u5f85\u8865\u5145: {pending}")

        new_story = "; ".join(story_parts)
        if existing and existing != new_story:
            combined = f"{existing} | latest: {new_story}"
            if len(combined) > 600:
                combined = combined[-600:]
            return combined
        return new_story

{"output":"- 客户场景：群聊用户连续发言，其中最新一条是「我的旅游签证过期了怎么办？」。
- 上一轮助理回复：假设上一条机器人回复是基于 Planner 草稿的欢迎语。
- Redis 结构：
  - `historical_user_messages`：仅存放用户历史消息（含时间戳）。
  - `last_assistant_message`：上一轮助理回复。
  - `latest_user_message`：本轮待处理的用户消息。
